mapper.select: select rq.rqno, rq.rqdate, rq.answ_stat_r, rq.rfile, q.qno as qna_no, q.qtitle as qna_title, rm.mno as writer_no, rm.mname as writer_name, dm.mno as partner_no, dm.mname as partner_name from talat_qna_rider rq inner join talat_qna q on rq.qno=q.qno inner join talat_journey_rider rj on rq.rjno=rj.rjno inner join talat_memb rm on rj.mno=rm.mno inner join talat_journey j on rj.jno=j.jno inner join talat_memb dm on j.mno=dm.mno order by rq.rqno desc

select rq.rqno, rq.rqdate, rq.answ_stat_r, rq.rqcont, rq.answ_cont_r, rq.rfile, q.qno as qna_no, q.qtitle as qna_title, rm.mno as writer_no, rm.mname as writer_name, dm.mno as partner_no, dm.mname as partner_name from talat_qna_rider rq inner join talat_qna q on rq.qno=q.qno inner join talat_journey_rider rj on rq.rjno=rj.rjno inner join talat_memb rm on rj.mno=rm.mno inner join talat_journey j on rj.jno=j.jno inner join talat_memb dm on j.mno=dm.mno where rq.rqno = #{value}
